me amathiwarayage nama ostreliyanu madhya magin pracharaya karana lada nisa eya rahasak nowe.yahapalanaya pilibanda wathman janadhipathiwarayage athi wishesha kapawima salaka balimedi oostreliyawe ‘sidni mornin harald ‘ yana puwathpathe pitu gananawak pura wisthara sahithawa palawi thibu me siddhiya ganada wahama rajaya wisin parikshanayak aaramba kirimen dushithayin soya owunta daduwam dimata rajayata athi dadi awashyathawaya thawaduratath janathawa idiriye thahawuru wanu atha.
